member.name: M:SmartShop.API.ProductsController.GetProducts
member.summary: Gets a list of products along with their subcategories.
member.returns: Returns an HTTP 200 OK response with a list of product data in the specified format.

member.name: M:SmartShop.API.ProductsController.GetProduct(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a specific product along with its subcategory by the provided identifier.
member.param: The unique identifier of the product.
member.returns: Returns an HTTP 200 OK response with the product data in the specified format. If no product is found with the given identifier, returns an HTTP 404 Not Found response.
